profile.name: Rushikesh Karkhanis
profile.aboutme: I am Full Stack developer having more than 5.6 years for experience with technologies Java, Spring Boot , AWS, React.Passionate programmer willing to share knowledge and learn any new technologies to solve problems.
profile.technicalprofiencies: Java 8 and above, including Spring Boot, functional programming, data structures and algorithms (DSA), multithreading, design patterns, and Spring Data JPA. OAuth authentication. AWS services: Lambda, EC2, VPC, Auto Scaling, SQS, SNS, IAM, SES, and Kinesis.

workexprience.project: MPP - Maintenance Plan Portal is product which ensures the maintenance of the vehicle sold to customer.

roles_responsibilities.point: Analysis, design and implementation of Maintenance Plan Portal
Design and Develop and Enhance services for MPP
Implemented Restful web services by using JAVA 8 and above, Spring Data JPA and Hibernate, AWS JAVA SDK.
Implemented UI for MPP by using React JS, and Redux toolkit for state- management.
Designed Database using ORM comfortable in relationship, mapping and inheritance in Spring data JPA.

Responsible to Performance improvement of apis and RESTful web services Non-blocking, reactive client to perform HTTP requests from Spring Boot and Completable Futures for java apis Developed Lambda for better processing of data to reduce time.
Used Gitlab for version control, to write ci/cd, integrated with AWS

workexprience.project: LMS - LMS remote care is a health care product which was designed to Designed and Developed LMS remote care according to client requirement.

roles_responsibilities.point: Implemented Apache Kafka for multiple microservices communication
Used AWS java SDK specifically to integrated AWS Secret Manager and AWS S3 Bucket to store static assets (excel files, pdfs)
Used AWS SES service to provide notifications (alarms) to users accessing LMS products
Implemented UI for MPP by using React JS, and Redux toolkit for state- management.
Ensured the code coverage above 90 percent and passed all the quality gates
Familiar in writing JUnit Test cases for the services.

Involved in implementation Gateway message micro service by using Spring Boot.
Developed a monitoring application for transaction, health check, performance and so on.

Involved in Unit Testing (Backend and Frontend).
